snippet: The annual pension payment for James Crosby, the former chief executive of the failed British bank HBOS, will still be more than 400,000 pounds, 23 times more than the 17,700 pound average income of retired households in Britain.
abstract: The annual pension payment for James Crosby, the former chief executive of the failed British bank HBOS, will still be more than 400,000 pounds, 23 times more than the 17,700 pound average income of retired households in Britain.
